versions.name: v1.0 Minimal

apps.name: CFSelenium
apps.desc: A native Selenium RC binding for ColdFusion, useful for writing tests in CFML that will trigger actions in the browser and verify the results.

versions.name: Current Version (from GitHub master branch)
versions.desc: Download from the GitHub project master branch (note: large download, be patient).

apps.name: ColdSpring
apps.desc: ColdSpring makes the configuration and dependencies of your CFCs easier to manage. It brings the power of the popular Spring framework for Java to ColdFusion. ColdSpring is also the first Aspect-Oriented-Programming (AOP) framework for CFCs. ColdSpring plays well with other frameworks, like Mach-II, Model-Glue, and Fusebox.

versions.name: ColdSpring 1.2 Stable
versions.desc: The latest stable release of the ColdSpring Framework

apps.name: FarCry
apps.desc: FarCry Core is a web application framework based on the ColdFusion language.

versions.name: FarCry 6.2
versions.desc: Latest stable release of FarCry 6.2, FarCry CMS plugin and Fandango Skeleton. See farcrycore.org for more information.

apps.name: Framework One (FW/1)
apps.desc: A web application framework based on ColdFusion.

versions.name: Full Resource Download (from GitHub master branch).
versions.desc: Includes documentation, code/app examples, and a skeleton app in addition to the framework files.

versions.name: Framework Folder Only (from GitHub master branch).
versions.desc: For downloading just the framework (org) folder.

apps.name: MXUnit
apps.desc: Unit Testing framework for ColdFusion developers

versions.name: MXUnit
versions.desc: Latest stable release of MXUnit. See mxunit.org for more information.

apps.name: Taffy
apps.desc: A framework for creating REST API's with extremely terse, object-oriented code.

versions.name: Bleeding Edge Release (BER)
versions.desc: The BER is the absolute latest available code. Possibility of bugs, but latest features!

versions.name: 1.1 Official Release
versions.desc: This is the latest version of Taffy, now with Railo support and improved ColdSpring integration

apps.name: ValidateThis
apps.desc: An object oriented validation framework for ColdFusion objects.

versions.desc: Download from the GitHub project master branch.

apps.name: Mango Blog
apps.desc: An Extensible Blog Engine. See mangoblog.org for more information.

apps.name: monkehTweet
apps.desc: A CFC wrapper to easily let you integrate your applications with the Twitter API.

versions.name: monkehTweet BER
versions.desc: Latest release of monkehTweet, direct from the GitHub source.

apps.name: Underscore.cfc
apps.desc: An Underscore.js port for Coldfusion. Functional programming library.
